alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 11:57AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT INTERSTATE 40 NEAR TWO GUNS IN COCONINO COUNTY THROUGH 1230 PM MST... At 1156 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Two Guns, or 23 miles west of Winslow, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Two Guns, Canyon Diablo, Raymond Wildlife Area, Anderson Canyon, Rimmy Jims, and Meteor Crater Rest Area. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 225 and 234. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County
